name: Swarm of Spiders
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.Spider Climb: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
traits.Swarm: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
traits.Web Sense: While in contact with a web, the swarm knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
traits.Web Walker: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.Bites: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 10 (4d4) piercing damage, or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
